resNameAdd:
1) Manik Shaikh alias Mohidul Islam
    Advocate - Monjul Hoque

business_details.Business: The prosecution is able to establish the charge against the accused Manik Sk under section 363 IPC and section 4 of the POCSO Act and accordingly he is convicted under said sections and sentenced him to go rigorous imprisonment for 3 years and also pay fine of Rs.5000/- in default rigorous imprisonment for 2 months under section 363 IPCThe accused further sentenced to go rigirous imprisonment for 7 years and also pay fine of Rs.10000/- in default rigorous imprisonment for 3 moths under section 4 of POCSO Act.
